```{r}

library(tidyverse)


```



```{r}

df <- read_csv(file = "SPACE/DNA/data_occ.csv")
#df
#fit <- lm(bytes ~ n * log2(n), data=df) # For Occ only
fit <- lm(bytes ~ n, data=df) # For OHE, WTs
#summary(fit)
coef(fit)

ggplot(df, aes(x = n, y = bytes)) + 
  geom_point() +
  stat_smooth(method = "lm") +
  theme_classic()


```
